thread.title: Engex, Inc. Declares Special Dividend on Common Stock

author: cnbc.com
title: Engex, Inc. Declares Special Dividend on Common Stock

organizations.name: board of directors of engex, inc.

text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- On February 1, 2018, the Board of Directors of Engex, Inc. (ticker symbol: EXGI) declared a special dividend on the Fund's Common Stock of $0.43 per share in cash payable February 20, 2018, to shareholders of record at the close of business on February 12, 2018.
Engex, Inc. is a non-diversified closed end investment company registered under the Investment Company Act of 1940.
Contact:
Michael Siciliano, Treasurer, Engex, Inc.
212-495-4500
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/engex-inc-declares-special-dividend-on-common-stock-300592403.html
SOURCE Engex, Inc.
